dcterms:description: Dataset used to improve the worst-case long-term data rate for a UAV-assisted wireless sensor network under jamming attacks by jointly configuring the UAVâ€™s transmission strategy and 3D flight path.

dcterms:description: Dataset for a reinforcement learning-based communication strategy developed between a UAV swarm and a base station to counteract jamming attempts, improving communication quality by exploring motion and antenna spatial domains.
dcterms:title: UAV swarm communication strategy

dcterms:creator: Z. Li
dcterms:description: Dataset for a secure UAV communication scheme against smart jammers using a knowledge-based reinforcement learning approach, leveraging domain information to reduce state space and speed up convergence.
dcterms:title: UAV communication scheme against smart jammers

dcterms:description: Dataset for intelligent reflecting surface (RIS) empowered physical-layer security, studying the effects of signal cancellation and jamming.
dcterms:title: RIS-assisted secure transmission

dcterms:creator: Y. Xu
dcterms:description: Dataset for computation capacity enhancement by joint UAV and RIS design in IoT, focusing on optimizing the interaction between UAVs and RIS for improved performance.
dcterms:title: Joint UAV and RIS design in IoT

dcterms:creator: C. You
R. Zhang
dcterms:description: Dataset for 3D trajectory optimization in Rician fading for UAV-enabled data harvesting, focusing on optimizing UAV paths in challenging channel conditions.
dcterms:title: UAV trajectory optimization in Rician fading
